message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for you, and it's worth a lot more than my asking price. I'm looking for a quick sale, so how about $19,000?
Hi Alice,  $19,000 is a bit out of my price range.  I'm interested in the product but I'm only willing to pay $12,000.  Let me know if you're open to negotiating.
